parameters.name: data_recipient_global_metastore_id
parameters.description: If not provided, all recipients will be returned. If no recipients exist with this ID, no results will be returned.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of recipients to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: The list of recipients was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of all share recipients within the current metastore where:
